channel.title: Products on Ketch Networking
channel.description: Recent content in Products on Ketch Networking

item.title: Tellabs Optical LAN
item.description: Tellabs FlexSym Series, a symmetrical 10 gigabit XGS-PON solution that provides significantly more flexibility to design an enterprise Local Area Network (LAN) for both commercial and federal government customers. The Tellabs FlexSym solution provides the unique ability to serve both 10G and G-PON on the same system, and even on the same PON service card, providing infinite options and a graceful migration to future higher speed network needs. Select XFP-based 10G XGS-PON and 2.

item.title: Tellabs 1000 Multi-Service Access Platform
item.description: Service providers face three conflicting challenges when it comes to maintaining and upgrading their access networks. They must: Satisfy the demand for TDM-based business services, even while transitioning to an all-IP Ethernet-centric network. Keep delivering legacy services, despite the fact that many legacy equipment vendors have Manufacture Discontinued (MDâ€™d) their product lines. Provide the most cost effective infrastructure while providing a variety of diseperate and technologically diverse services.
